formattedChat:
1699388451 Buyer: Hi there! I believe I received the wrong jersey from you! I was wondering if I could get a refund on my purchase? 
1699388553 Seller: Good afternoon! I looked over your purchase record, and I'm afraid it looks like you bought the right item--it's advertised as a generic jersey, not one for a specific player. Given that, I'm afraid I can't issue you a refund. I'm sorry for the inconvenience!
1699388719 Buyer: I appreciate your timely response! I can understand how there is confusion. There were two options on the site. One for the generic jersey and a couple of specific jerseys. I had chosen the very specific one for my nephew and I think maybe I was shipped the incorrect order unfortunately! Is there anyway we could do a partial refund for me today? 
1699388896 Seller: Of course! We try to reach all our customers as quickly as we can. I'd be more than happy to get the correct item to you--how about we spit the difference? If you can return the generic jersey, I'll get the correct one shipped to you. While were talking, I was hoping we could talk about the negative review you left on my business--as you can imagine, that can be very damaging. Could I convince you to retract that review?
1699389108 Buyer: I can return the generic jersey, no problem! I wrote a bad review on your site because you wrote a bad review of me. I apologize. I will retract my review of me if can you remove your negative review on mine and if you apologize. How does that sound?  
1699389202 Seller: You know, that's a good idea. You seem really reasonable--how about we retract both negative reviews, each write an apology giving someone who stumbles by the review the full context, and we get the correct jerseys to each other?
1699389315 Buyer: This seems very reasonable to me. I think at the end of the day we both just want a positive out come out of this so I am very happy with this result and I really appreciate you working with me on this. 
1699389355 Seller: Agreed! I'm grateful for your time. Hope you have a great rest of your day!
1699389381 Buyer: I believe theres a few things left to say!! 
1699389423 Seller: Oh? I beg your pardon. What can I do for you?
1699389451 Buyer:  I was just going to say have a great rest of your day! 
1699389479 Seller: Thank you, you too!
1699389486 Buyer: Submitted agreement: Buyer gets partial refund, buyer retracted their review, seller retracted their review, buyer did apologize, and seller did apologize.
1699389501 Seller: Accept Deal

1699389969 Buyer: Hello. I need you to make this right. This is for my nephew thats really sick

1699390322 Buyer: I will return it but i think you should
1699390352 Seller: we will be happy to refund your purchase upon receipt of the merchandise]
